arts.ttl: Jizz Hornkamp makes it four goals in four as Heracles beat FC Twente
arts.sum: Heracles striker Jizz Hornkamp is in great form at the moment. The striker, who had only scored two goals by the end of February, has now scored four goals inâ€¦

Twente's hopes of qualifying for the Europa League face another challenge on Sunday as they take on Heracles at Asito Stadion. Heracles, currently under pressure, are trying to stay clear of the releg...
